name: Cover Letter Attachment

user_question: For this Multi-Project application, are you submitting late/changed, requesting $500k+ direct costs, submitting an R13/U13, planning a video, generating large-scale genomic data, using HFT, or need to explain inactive subaward periods?

condition: Required for Multi-Project grant applications (as they are not fellowships).

condition: Required if the proposed Multi-Project involves HFT obtained from elective abortions.

condition: Required for all Multi-Project grant applications.

name: Bibliography & References Cited
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications unless otherwise specified in the NOFO.

name: Facilities & Other Resources
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications unless otherwise specified in the NOFO.

name: Equipment
condition: Required for all Multi-Project applications.
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project application?

name: Foreign Justification
condition: Required if the Multi-Project involves activities outside the U.S. or partnerships with international collaborators.

name: Project/Performance Site Location(s) Form
condition: Required for all Multi-Project applications.
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project application?

name: Additional Location(s)
condition: Required if the Multi-Project has more performance sites than the form allows space for.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project have more project/performance sites than can be listed directly on the form?

name: R&R Senior/Key Person Profile (Expanded) Form
condition: Required for all Multi-Project applications.
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project application?

name: Biographical Sketch (Biosketch)
condition: Required for PD/PI(s), all Senior/Key Personnel, and Other Significant Contributors (OSCs) in a Multi-Project application.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project application identify PD/PI(s), Senior/Key Personnel, or Other Significant Contributors?

name: Current & Pending Support / Other Support
condition: Generally required Just-in-Time (JIT) for Multi-Project applications, not at submission, unless specified in NOFO.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project NOFO specifically require Current & Pending / Other Support at the time of application submission?

name: Additional Senior / Key Person Profile(s) Attachment
condition: Required if Multi-Project application includes more than 100 Senior/Key persons and OSCs combined.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project application list more than 100 individuals in total across the PD/PI, Senior/Key Personnel, and Other Significant Contributor roles?

name: R&R Budget Form
condition: Required for Multi-Project components if direct costs >$250k/year, or required by NOFO, or for foreign institutions, or if using HFT; cannot be used with Modular budget.
user_question: For any component in your Multi-Project application, are you requesting >$250,000 direct costs in any year OR is it a foreign component OR using HFT OR does the NOFO require a detailed R&R budget?

name: Additional Senior/Key Persons (Budget Detail)
condition: Required if requesting funds for more Senior/Key persons than the R&R Budget form allows space for in Section A for a specific component.
user_question: For any component using the R&R Budget form, are you requesting funds for more Senior/Key persons than fit in Section A?

name: Additional Equipment (Budget Detail)
condition: Required if requesting funds for more equipment items >$5,000 (or lower institutional limit) than the R&R Budget form allows space for in Section C for a specific component.
user_question: For any component using the R&R Budget form, are you requesting funds for more equipment items (costing over $5,000 each or your institutional limit) than fit in Section C?

name: Budget Justification (R&R Budget)
condition: Required when using the R&R Budget form for any component.
user_question: Are you using the R&R Budget form for any component in your Multi-Project application?

name: R&R Subaward Budget Attachment(s) Form
condition: Required if using the R&R Budget Form for a component and including subawards/consortiums performing substantive work for that component.
user_question: Are you using the R&R Budget form for a component AND does that component include subawards/consortiums performing a substantive portion of the work?

name: Subaward R&R Budget Form (PDF)
condition: Required for each subaward/consortium performing substantive work when using the main R&R Budget form for a component.
user_question: Do you have one or more subawards/consortiums performing substantive work for a component using the R&R Budget (requiring a separate budget)?

name: Subaward Budget Justification (PDF)
condition: Required for each subaward R&R Budget Form submitted.
user_question: Do you have one or more subawards/consortiums submitting a separate R&R budget?

name: PHS Additional Indirect Costs Form
condition: Required only for the Overall Component of Multi-Project applications detailing F&A on first $25k of subawards leading components.
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project application where subawards lead entire components, requiring calculation of F&A on the first $25k for the Overall component?

name: Budget Justification (Additional Indirect Costs)
condition: Required when using the PHS Additional Indirect Costs form.
user_question: Are you using the PHS Additional Indirect Costs form?

name: PHS 398 Research Plan Form
condition: Required for Multi-project (M) applications (and Research/SBIR/STTR).
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project application (or Research/SBIR/STTR)?

condition: Required only for Resubmission or Revision Multi-Project applications (or if NOFO specifies).
user_question: Is your Multi-Project application a Resubmission or Revision (or does the NOFO require an Introduction)?

name: Specific Aims (Research Plan)
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications using the Research Plan unless otherwise specified in the NOFO.
user_question: Is the Specific Aims attachment required for your Multi-Project application (check NOFO if unsure)?

name: Research Strategy
condition: Required for all Multi-Project applications using the Research Plan.
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project application requiring a Research Plan?

name: Progress Report Publication List
condition: Required only for Renewal Multi-Project applications.
user_question: Is your Multi-Project application a Renewal?

name: Vertebrate Animals
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications if using live vertebrate animals.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project research involve live vertebrate animals?

name: Select Agent Research
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications if research involves select agents.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project research involve select agents?

name: Multiple PD/PI Leadership Plan
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications if designating more than one PD/PI.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project application designate more than one PD/PI?

name: Consortium/Contractual Arrangements
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications if project includes consortiums/contracts.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project involve consortiums or contractual arrangements?

name: Letters of Support
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications if collaborators, consultants, or consortium participants are involved.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project involve collaborators, consultants, or consortium participants requiring letters of support?

name: Resource Sharing Plan(s)
condition: Required for Multi-Project if developing model organisms or specific research tools (largely superseded by DMS Plan, check NOFO/policy).
user_question: Are you developing unique model organisms or research tools in your Multi-Project AND does your NOFO (or current NIH policy) require a separate Resource Sharing Plan distinct from the DMS Plan?

name: Data Management and Sharing (DMS) Plan
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications if research generates scientific data and is subject to the NIH DMS Policy (check NOFO/policy). Must be in Overall Component.
user_question: Does your proposed Multi-Project research generate scientific data subject to the NIH Data Management and Sharing Policy?

name: Authentication of Key Biological and/or Chemical Resources
condition: Required for Multi-Project applications if key biological and/or chemical resources are used.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project research use key biological and/or chemical resources that require authentication?

name: Appendix
condition: Optional for Multi-Project applications, and only for specific allowable materials (blank forms, or as specified in NOFO).
user_question: Do you need to include allowable Appendix materials for your Multi-Project application (e.g., blank survey forms, blank consent forms, materials explicitly allowed by NOFO)?

name: PHS Human Subjects and Clinical Trials Information Form
condition: Required for all Multi-Project applications.
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project application?

name: Explanation for use of non-HS human specimens/data
condition: Required if using human specimens/data AND answered 'Yes' to using them AND some/all use is NOT considered human subjects research.
user_question: Are you using human specimens or data in your Multi-Project, and do you assert that this use does NOT constitute human subjects research?

name: Other Requested Information (HS/CT Form)
condition: Optional for Multi-Project, generally only used for renewals to list ongoing studies/ClinicalTrials.gov IDs, or if required by NOFO.
user_question: Are you submitting a Multi-Project renewal application OR does your NOFO specifically require the 'Other Requested Information' attachment on the Human Subjects form?

name: Delayed Onset Study Justification
condition: Required if you add a 'Delayed Onset Study' record to the PHS Human Subjects and Clinical Trials Information form for a Multi-Project application.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project application include plans for human subjects research that cannot be described at the time of application (Delayed Onset)?

name: Inclusion of Individuals Across the Lifespan
condition: Required for Multi-Project studies involving human subjects, unless only Exemption 4 applies.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project study involve human subjects AND is it NOT solely exempt under Exemption 4?

name: Inclusion of Women and Minorities
condition: Required for Multi-Project studies involving human subjects, unless only Exemption 4 applies.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project study involve human subjects AND is it NOT solely exempt under Exemption 4?

name: Recruitment and Retention Plan
condition: Required for Multi-Project studies involving human subjects, unless only Exemption 4 applies.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project study involve human subjects AND is it NOT solely exempt under Exemption 4?

name: Study Timeline
condition: Required if the Multi-Project study is a clinical trial.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project study meet the NIH definition of a clinical trial?

name: Protection of Human Subjects
condition: Required for all Multi-Project studies involving human subjects.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project study involve human subjects?

condition: Required for AHRQ Multi-Project applicants conducting non-exempt, multi-site domestic research, unless an exception applies.

name: Overall Structure of the Study Team
condition: Optional for Multi-Project unless required by the specific NOFO.

name: Statistical Design and Power
condition: Required if the Multi-Project study is a clinical trial.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project study meet the NIH definition of a clinical trial?

name: IND/IDE Status

condition: Required if the Multi-Project study is a clinical trial.
user_question: Does your Multi-Project study meet the NIH definition of a clinical trial?

condition: Required only if specified/required or permitted by the NOFO for a clinical trial within a Multi-Project application.

condition: Optional for Multi-Project applications, used to suggest IC/Study Section assignment.
